Herefter er stenene n√¶nsomt renset og fragtet til Nordhavn, hvor de nu udg√∏r murv√¶rket i Provianthuset. title: Short term rental of 2-room apartment in green area
description:
Hi, I'm renting out my apartment in Copenhagen for summer. You can move in in June and be there until middle or end of August. The apartment is furnished, there is an option to have extra bed in living room.
The bedroom gets a lot of light in the morning and living room has a balcony facing green courtyard. It's a very quiet area and it takes 10 min bike to the nearest beach :)
The washing machine and dryer are downstairs.
5 min to the nearest bus ( 5c ) and 12 min walk to the nearest metro ( Fem√∏ren ), max 20 min bike to city centre.
Write me if interested :)

title: Lejlighed midt p√• Christianshavn/Apartment in the heart of Christianshavn
description:
DANSK (English description below): 

Lejligheden og ejendommen
Lejligheden er lys, gennemrenoveret, har slebne plankegulve og ligger p√• 4. sal. Der er √•bent stue-/k√∏kken-alrum med stor bordplade, ovn, gaskomfur, opvaskemaskine og vaskemaskine. Fra den hyggelige altan har man udsigt over g√•rden. Sovev√¶relset byder p√• et stort, indbygget skab og v√¶gh√¶ngte sengeborde. Fra entreen er der adgang til det lille men moderne badev√¶relse. Ejendommen er meget velholdt og popul√¶r. Der er masser af siddemuligheder, grill og gr√∏nne arealer i g√•rden samt afl√•st cykelk√¶lder. Burmeistersgade har for nylig gennemg√•et en st√∏rre renovering og der er b√•de et pizzeria, et supermarked og en kiosk, hvor man kan hente post/pakker lige om hj√∏rnet.
 
Omgivelserne
Lejligheden ligger 2 minutters gang fra Christianshavns kanal. Man skal kun krydse en enkelt bro for at komme til Broens Gadek√∏kken, der har streetfood om sommeren og sk√∏jtebane om vinteren. Lige over for ligger Papir√∏en, hvor man kan nyde solen fra det nye tr√¶d√¶k og hvor et 5.000 m2 wellness- og spabad forventes at √•bne i 2026. Der er kun en kort g√•tur til operaen, den nyanlagte Operapark og Christianias smukke naturarealer midt i byen. Reffen kan hurtigt n√•s p√• cykel. Der er om sommeren masser af bademuligheder p√• og omkring Christianshavn. 
 
Transport
Buslinje 2A g√•r fra nabovejen og Christianshavn metrostation kan n√•s p√• 5-10 minutter til fods. Nyhavn og Indre By kan n√•s p√• 10-15 minutter via Inderhavnsbroen.

Praktisk
Overtagelse 1/7 eller efter aftale. Lejeperioden er √©t √•r. Lejligheden udlejes uden de flytbare m√∏bler og pendellamper, der ses p√• billederne. Der er adgang til et k√¶lderrum.

ENGLISH:
 
About the apartment and building
The apartment is bright, fully renovated, features sanded wooden floorboards, and is located on the 4th floor. It has an open-plan living room and kitchen with a large countertop, oven, gas stove, dishwasher, and washing machine. From the cozy balcony, you have a view of the courtyard. The bedroom includes a large built-in wardrobe and wall-mounted bedside tables. The apartment has a small but modern bathroom. The building is well-maintained and the courtyard offers plenty of seating opportunities, green spaces, can be used for barbecue, and gives access to a locked bicycle storage room. Burmeistersgade has recently undergone major renovations, and there is a pizzeria, a supermarket, and a kiosk for parcel pick-up right around the corner.
 
The surroundings
The apartment is just a 2-minute walk from the Christianshavn Canal. You only need to cross one small bridge to reach Broens Gadek√∏kken, which offers street food in the summer and an ice skating rink in the winter or Papir√∏en, where you can enjoy the sun on the new wooden deck, and where a 5,000 m¬≤ wellness and spa facility is expected to open in 2026. The Opera House and Opera Park, as well as the beautiful green spaces of Christiania are all within walking distance. Reffen which offers more street food and lots of activities is just a short bike ride away. During the summer, there are plenty of swimming spots in and around Christianshavn.
 
Transport
Bus line 2A runs from the next street, and Christianshavn Metro Station can be reached on foot in 5‚Äì10 minutes. Nyhavn and the city centre are just a 10‚Äì15 minute walk across Inderhavnsbroen (bridge across the harbour) .
 
Practical Information
Available from July 1st. The rental period is one year. The apartment is rented out without the movable furniture and pendant lamps seen in the photos. A basement storage room is available.

ENGLISH BELOW

Lejligheden er 77 kvadratmeter med et sovev√¶relse og stue samt et forenet k√∏kken og opholdsrum. Lejligheden er meget lys med sine store vinduespartier, og der er masser af plads til at indrette et kontor i b√•de sovev√¶relset og stuen. Ejendommen er opf√∏rt i 2001. Der er gode parkeringsforhold, elevator og fine f√¶llesfaciliteter i et gr√∏nt udemilj√∏. Ejendommen ligger ogs√• t√¶t p√• den gr√∏nne sti, og det meste af byen ligger i cykelafstand. B√•de metro og s-togstation ligger 1,5 km v√¶k fra lejligheden.

---

77 m2 apartment with a living room, a bedroom, and a united kitchen and dining room. The apartment is well-lit due to the big windows, and there is plenty of room for an office space both in the living room and the bedroom. Additionally, there is a spacious bathroom with a separate shower and a washing machine. You can enjoy a beautiful view from the living room and the balcony. A storage room in the basement is included. 

The building was built in 2001 and has an elevator. A parking space is included and the building is surrounded by greenery. The apartment is also close to ‚Äòden gr√∏nne sti‚Äô, and most of Frederiksberg and Copenhagen is travelable by bike. A metro station and s train station is located within 1,5 km from the apartment.

Smoking is strictly prohibited ‚Äì both inside the apartment and on the balcony. Pets are not allowed. 

I expect to move into the apartment summer next year at the earliest and I am therefore renting the apartment out for the next 12 months. The apartment is ready to be moved into.

 Hele lejligheden er desuden installeret med gulvvarme, som kan justeres individuelt i de enkelte rum. 

 Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

 Banehaverne er tegnet af det prisvindende arkitektfirma Sweco Architects, som har √∏nsket at skabe en ejendom med fokus p√• f√¶llesskab og livskvalitet.

Kort om omr√•det:

 Omr√•det omkring Banehaverne byder p√• en harmonisk blanding af natur, kultur og byliv.

Her er storsl√•et natur ved b√•de vand og skov, gode skoler og daginstitutioner samt et v√¶ld af fritidstilbud inden for b√•de friluftsliv, idr√¶t og kreative aktiviteter.

Alt sammen er med til at skabe de bedste foruds√¶tninger for en hverdag, der glider nemt og er rig p√• sjove og sp√¶ndende muligheder.

Banehaverne nyder godt af deres strategiske placering t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavn. Med kun 10 min. gang til Glostrup Station og nem adgang til motorvejsnetv√¶rket er K√∏benhavn t√¶t p√•. Du kan nyde godt af den korte afstand til K√∏benhavn, mens du stadig kan tr√¶kke dig tilbage til den rolige atmosf√¶re i Glostrup/Br√∏ndby om aftenen.

Lovely furnished villa apartment for rent from 1/9-25 for 6-9 months.
Welcome to this beautiful apartment, which is spread over 126 sqm. on the ground floor and approx. 90 sqm. high basement with several good rooms. The property has a large garden with several good terraces and 1 private parking space. You get a lovely classic apartment in a beautiful and stately villa in a good location on Amager. 
Note: FURNISHED and for rent for 6-9 months from 1/9-25.
The apartment contains: Entrance with space for outerwear, Large kitchen-dining room with direct access to the terrace and garden. Bedroom, lovely large living room with an office in the bay window and a spacious bedroom. In addition, a beautiful bathroom with both shower and bath. The lower floor offers several available rooms for storage, 2 rooms/guest rooms and a bathroom/utility room and toilet.
You'll be close to everything the city has to offer. Amagerbro tempts with coffee shops, delicious brunch and small shops, just as you can shop in Amager Centret, and if you're looking for even more city experiences, hop on the metro just 250 metres from your street door - it takes you directly to the city centre. You'll also enjoy the short distance to √òresund and sunny days at Amager Strandpark.

FOR RENT 4-12 MONTHS. 
Lovely apartment with a balcony in Vester Voldgade just behind Copenhagen City Hall and with a view of Tivoli's towers and beautiful old buildings. The street has recently been upgraded with wide pavements, where you will find cafes, shops, Str√∏get and the Metro just around the corner. You are welcomed by a nice and well-maintained hall way with elevator. The apartment of 159 sqm has a spacious entrance, bright open kitchen - dining room, south-facing living room with a view of beautiful old buildings and the Tivoli towers, 2 good bedrooms, bathroom and guest toilet. The apartment is elegantly furnished and well planned. From the large shared roof terrace you can enjoy the view over Copenhagen and not least the view of Copenhagen City Hall and Tivoli Gardens. All in all a well-maintained apartment, centrally located. NOTE: Not possible to registre your address.

description:
**Flot tov√¶relses lejlighed udlejes i den smukke ejendom kaldet Oasen 
** 
Lejligheden har en dejlig, stor terrasse ud mod det f√¶lles, gr√∏nne omr√•de. Selvom det hedder 1. tv., svarer lejligheden til en stuelejlighed, da hele lejlighedskomplekset ligger p√• toppen af SuperBrugsen. Det skal ses!

I den nye forstad opf√∏res i alt ca. 3000 nye boliger, egen skole og indk√∏bsmuligheder. Desuden er der i N√¶rheden et f√¶lleshus med mange aktiviteter for store og sm√•.

 **Denne lejlighed indeholder:**

I N√¶rHeden er alle t√¶t p√• indk√∏b, skole, institutioner, fritidsaktiviteter og natur. Mange af de vigtigste knudepunkter kan n√•s via Loopet ‚Äì det gr√∏nne parkstr√∏g, der forbinder N√¶rHeden med Hedehusene via underf√∏ringer under jernbanen. Loopet, som er forbeholdt g√•ende og cyklister, bliver indrettet med gr√∏nne byrum og forskellige aktivitetszoner. 
N√¶rHeden er et moderne byliv, der kombinerer det bedste fra hovedstaden og det bedste fra byen. Her er t√¶tte bebyggelser med intime byrum, sm√• private arealer og f√¶llesfaciliteter.

description:
Hvis du dr√∏mmer om at bo p√• en sk√∏n, central adresse, der stadig ikke er langt fra naturomr√•der, s√• er det her, du skal l√¶se med. Disse tiltalende lejligheder ligger nemlig i en gulstensbygning i Glostrup.

Langs boligkomplekset l√∏ber et f√¶llesarealet med masser af pl√¶ne, s√• her er rig mulighed for at s√¶tte sig ud og nyde en solstr√•le. Der er tilmed en legeplads med sandkasse, gynger og legehus.

title: Stor, flot 3-v√¶relses lejlighed med egen altan i S√∏borg
description:
Indretning:

Denne bolig er skr√¶ddersyet til at im√∏dekomme familiers behov for kvalitet, funktionalitet og en nem hverdag, lejligheden byder p√• en entre med opbevaring, Lyse v√¶relser med skabe, badev√¶relse med kombi vask samt bruseniche og et stort k√∏kkenalrum med udgang til en stor altan hvor sommeren kan nydes.

Ejendommen:

I S√∏borg findes den sp√¶ndende og attraktive bebyggelse ‚ÄôM√∏belfabrikken‚Äô fra 2019. M√¶rk historiens vingesus i ejendommen fra 1939, der blev opf√∏rt som industribyggeri til m√∏belproduktion. Hovedhuset er bevaret grundet sine s√¶rlige kulturelle v√¶rdier, mens selskabet Dades p√• den bagvedliggende grund har opf√∏rt en moderne beboelsesejendom. Her er 184 fantastiske boliger, der har et str√∏mlinet udtryk inde s√•vel som ude med flotte tegl og st√•lvinduer samt en lys og minimalistisk indretning, s√• familien let kan s√¶tte sit pr√¶g. Det sociale samlingspunkt i det √•bne og levende milj√∏ bliver det frodige g√•rdrum i New Yorker-stil med plads til leg, hygge ved bordeb√¶nkes√¶ttene og spadsereture p√• stierne mellem de gr√∏nne arealer. I g√•rden er der cykelparkering og i k√¶lderen mulighed for p-plads til bilen mod betaling. Der er naturligvis elevator i alle opgange.

Parkering koster 850 kr. i p-hus og 550 kr. p√• terr√¶n.

Omr√•de:

Alle hverdagens forn√∏denheder t√¶t p√•. Beliggenheden er fordelagtigt t√¶t p√• bylivet i b√•de Lyngby og K√∏benhavn. I n√¶rmilj√∏et finder I dog alt, hvad I har brug for i dagligdagen med skole, daginstitution, Buddinge Centeret, Gladsaxe Centeret og S√∏borg Hovedgade indenfor kort afstand. Natursk√∏nne omgivelser til s√∏ndagspicnic og l√∏beture m√∏der I ved Utterslev Mose, og offentlig transport rykker t√¶ttere p√• med den kommende letbane gennem Buddinge.

breadcrumb: Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 4 v√¶relses > K√∏benhavn S > Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 4 v√¶relses > K√∏benhavn S
title: UN17 Spidsen - 4 v√¶r. familiebolig eller delevenlig bolig med fantastisk udsigt til Kalvebod F√¶lled
description:
Om boligen:

Boligen er en lys, velindrettet 4 v√¶relses lejlighed med en god optimeret planl√∏sning, der rummer et fint √•bent k√∏kken/alrum med plads til b√•de spiseafdeling og hyggeligt stueomr√•de. De 4 gode v√¶relser byder p√• mange anvendelsesmuligheder, alt efter om du har behov for et b√∏rnev√¶relse, kontor eller g√¶stev√¶relse, foruden sovev√¶relset.

Fra k√∏kken/alrummet er der udgang til boligens altan, hvorfra du kan nyde den smukkeste udsigt til F√¶lledens rige natur- og dyreliv. Boligen har store vinduespartier, der inviterer dagslys og den fantastiske natur indenfor  samt flotte egetr√¶sparketgulve og gulvvarme.

Det smukke hvide k√∏kken er fra Rotpunkt med alt i h√•rde hvidevarer, induktionskogeplade, k√∏le-/fryseskab, indbygningsovn og opvaskemaskine.

Badev√¶relset er bekl√¶dt med flotte, lyse fliser, har separat bruseniche, og er naturligvis indrettet med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

Om Spidsen:

 Spidsen er en elegant boligejendom, tegnet af arkitekter fra Sweco. Ejendommen har en helt unik beliggenhed ud mod s√∏en og det natursk√∏nne Kalvebod F√¶lled. Det er √©n af √òrestads absolut bedste beliggenheder.

P√• toppen af ejendommen opf√∏res to store f√¶lles tagterrasser med plads til afslapning, leg og spisning. Herfra har du den smukkeste udsigt over de gr√∏nne vidder.

Spidsen er en del af UN17 Village, som byder p√• en r√¶kke f√¶llesfaciliteter, du kan f√• gl√¶de af. Blandt andet v√¶ksthuse, tagterrasser og ikke mindst sk√∏nne g√•rdrum med faciliteter for b√•de b√∏rn og voksne.

ENGELSK:

Are you dreaming of living in a brand new, modern, and spacious corner apartment with fantastic natural light and an unobstructed view of the beautiful Carl's Garden? Now you have the chance to rent this unique 6-room, 125 m¬≤ apartment, located in the renowned Nebelong Hus in the heart of Copenhagen's most exciting new district, Carlsberg Byen. This rental is open to private individuals, and expatriate employees (expats).

The apartment will be handed over as a new construction in June 2025 and is available for rent from July 1st, 2025, to approximately May 2026 (approx. 11 months), with the possibility of extension by agreement.

About the Apartment:

Type: Bright and attractive corner apartment with optimal natural light and views.
Area: 125 m¬≤ of living space.
Rooms: 6 rooms, including a large, bright living room openly connected to a open kitchen, a master bedroom, and three additional well-sized rooms perfect as bedrooms, children's rooms, or a home office.
View: Enjoy the open view, with a look towards green areas and Carl's Garden.
Bathrooms: The apartment offers two separate, modern, and well-appointed bathrooms.
Kitchen & Appliances: New, stylish kitchen with quality appliances, including a dishwasher, large fridge/freezer, built-in oven, and induction hob. Furthermore, a washing machine and tumble dryer are included in the apartment.
Balcony: Lovely 5 m¬≤ balcony, where the view and sun can be enjoyed.
Condition: Brand new (completed June 2025).
Facilities: Elevator in the building and bicycle storage associated with the apartment.
About Nebelong Hus & Carlsberg Byen:

Nebelong Hus, designed by Vilhelm Lauritzen Architects, is an elegant 5-story residential building that beautifully reflects its historic surroundings at Malttorvet. The property features a lovely green courtyard garden reserved for residents.

The location is in the quiet southwestern corner of Carlsberg Byen, with direct access to the district's large, beautiful parks such as Carl Jacobsens Have and J.C. Jacobsens Have. At the same time, you are just a few steps from the vibrant life of the district at Bryggernes Plads and Ottilia Jacobsens Plads, with caf√©s, shops, cultural attractions, and excellent infrastructure.

Practical Information:

Furnishing: The apartment is rented unfurnished.
Insurance: It is a requirement that the tenant takes out and maintains a personal liability insurance for the entire rental period.
Smoking: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the apartment and on the balcony.
Short-Term Letting: Subletting via Airbnb or similar short-term rental platforms is strictly prohibited.
Viewings: By appointment

Welcome to Hostrupsvej in the vibrant Frederiksberg/Vesterbro area, where city life is lived right outside your door. Here you will find an attractive home and at the same time a central base located in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most sought-after and culturally exciting neighborhoods.
The apartment is located at the top of a classic and well-maintained property and offers a bright and functional floor plan and a view of the city‚Äôs rooftops. If you don‚Äôt want to take the stairs to the 5th floor, you can use the elevator that takes you directly to the apartment from where you also have access to your own private roof terrace. Here you can relax and at the same time enjoy the outdoors, spending time with family and friends while enjoying the panoramic view of the city. It is peaceful and undisturbed here, even though you live in the middle of the city.
Hostrupsvej is located at the crossroads between Frederiksberg‚Äôs quiet, green streets and Vesterbro‚Äôs lively cultural life. You are a few minutes‚Äô walk from the iconic ‚ÄúK√∏dbyen‚Äù (Meat packer district), which houses some of the city‚Äôs best restaurants, bars and creative industries. By day a mecca for gastronomy and galleries ‚Äì by night one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most popular nightlife spots.
Within a short distance you will also find V√¶rnedamsvej ‚Äì known as ‚ÄúLittle Paris‚Äù with delicatessens, specialty shops and cozy caf√©s. S√∏ndermarken and Frederiksberg Have ‚Äì Both public parks with perfect green breathing spaces for runs, picnics or walks in scenic surroundings. Det Ny Teater, VEGA (Concerthall) and Planetarium ‚Äì top-class cultural institutions, all within cycling distance.
There is easy access to public transport by metro, S-train and buses, which quickly connect you to the rest of the city.
A rare combination in one of the city‚Äôs most dynamic districts.

 er et moderne bof√¶llesskab, hvor vi har taget de bedste ting fra de traditionelle bof√¶llesskaber og kombineret dem med det moderne menneskes behov for frihed, plads og individuelle √∏nsker.

title: Beautiful modern flat in √òrestad - a few minutes away from the City Center by metro
description:
Beautiful modern apartment in √òrestad, close to the metro and only a few minutes away from Copenhagen city center, Amagerf√¶lled forest, the beach, the airport and the Royal Golf Center.
 
The building was built in 2007, is energy efficient and has all facilities. It is 106 square meters large, has 3 large bedrooms, 1 balcony, an open and fully equipped kitchen and dining area, large living room, bathroom with washing machine and dryer, and a small basement. Please note that the apartment will be rented out without furniture. 

The area is very well connected and close to the city center, Amagerstrand beach, the airport, and all areas of Copenhagen thanks to the new metro. 

Only at a couple of minutes walking distance from the flat, you will find several grocery shopping options (Netto, Rema1000, Bilka), Scandinavian's largest shopping center and movie theater (Fields), Amagerf√¶lled forest (where you can go for beautiful and long walks all the way to the water), and the Royal Golf Center. 

At the Bella Sky hotel (just a few steps away), you can treat yourself to great SPA treatments, sushi and cocktails on the rooftop bar.

Overall, a great flat, well connected to the whole of Copenhagen, worth visiting - perfect for a family, and suitable for sharing between 3 people.

Planning an extended stay in Copenhagen and looking for a furnished apartment?
Then this 119 sqm, 4-room apartment might be just what you‚Äôre looking for. Located in a quiet yet central neighborhood, just a short walk from Tivoli Gardens, the Glyptotek Museum, Kalvebod Brygge, Copenhagen Central Station, and the metro.

- EV charging stations available on the street

The apartment is ideal for a couple or a small family looking to live centrally in Copenhagen without compromising on comfort, charm, or peace and quiet.

title: Spacious, furnished apartment with lots of sunlight and park-view, south-facing balcony
description:
We will be spending some time abroad and are therefore renting out our beloved home. The apartment is a spacious 94 square meters, boasting two cozy bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, a proper bathroom and a huge open living space with a south-facing balcony. As there is a park right outside the window, it feels very close to nature while still being central. The modern apartment complex also comes with a shared garden complete with new playground, a BBQ area, boules, and more. An elevator enables easy access whenever needed. This rental is perfect for two adults or a couple or a small family with one child. It is fully furnished incl. all key electrical appliances, fully equipped kitchen etc.

It is located just a short walk away from Frederiksberg Center and Valby. You'll have easy access to supermarkets and take-away options, making your daily life a breeze. It is also just a 15min bus or bike ride to the city center with an "A bus" just outside the door and only a few minutes walking distance from the closest S-train station.
  
We are looking for tenants for June and July this year, exact timing can be discussed

title: POSTBYEN, LEJEBOLIGER
description:
Nu kan du flytte ind i Postbyens t√•rne, og se K√∏benhavn fra oven.

Postbyens markante silhuet med sine fire runde t√•rne er allerede blevet et nyt vartegn for den centrale del af K√∏benhavn. I to af t√•rnene indrettes der 160 moderne lejeboliger, som nu udbydes til udlejning med indflytning i februar 2026. Lejlighederne varierer i st√∏rrelse fra to til syv v√¶relser og er alle udstyret med altan med udsigt til byens liv og Postbyens gr√∏nne oaser.

I Postbyen bor du i et helt nyt levende bykvarter med hoteller, butikker, restauranter, caf√©er, og meget mere. Dit nye hjem ligger omgivet af smuk arkitektur, og nedenfor din hovedd√∏r ligger byparken, der gr√∏nt og frodigt snor sig gennem Postbyen. Fri for biler og med plads til mennesker.

Boligerne og deres arkitektoniske fremtoning

Uanset om du lejer en 2-v√¶relses eller en 7-v√¶relses bolig i Postbyen, kommer du til at leve i et unikt og utraditionelt hjem, der byder p√• alt andet end kvadratiske rum. De cirkelrunde boligt√•rne skaber nemlig vinkler, snit og hj√∏rner, hvor man hver dag kan gl√¶des over at bo i et hjem, hvor v√¶gge, gulve og lofter ikke f√∏lger den traditionelle vinkeltrekant.
Boligt√•rnenes karakteristiske takkede facadeprofiler skaber nogle sp√¶ndende indvendige vinduesl√∏sninger med dybe nicher. Det giver en r√¶kke hyggelige kroge, hvor udsigten kan nydes med en pude i ryggen og byen for f√∏dderne.
Alle boliger er fork√¶let med muligheden for at sidde udenfor p√• sin egen, private altan, hvor udsigten tager vejret fra dig, jo h√∏jere du bor. En oplevelse, der f√∏rst slutter, n√•r elevatoren standser ved 28. etage i det h√∏jeste boligt√•rn.

Nordiske materialer og r√• kontraster
Tr√¶d ind i et hjem, hvor √¶stetik og funktionalitet g√•r h√•nd i h√•nd. Alle lejligheder i Postbyen er gennemt√¶nkt ned til mindste detalje med materialer, der emmer af varme og elegance. De lyse lamelplankegulve i natureg med gulvvarme l√∏ber i et ubrudt flow gennem rummene og binder boligen harmonisk sammen.
Med lofter og s√∏jler i beton opst√•r der en sp√¶ndende og r√• kontrast mellem det varme tr√¶ og den karakteristiske betonstruktur og tilf√∏rer boligen kant og karakter.

title: Townhouse lejlighed i 2-plan med stor privat tagterrasse
description:
Sk√∏n lejlighed p√• 166 kvm med v√¶relser i stueplan og f√¶lles opholdsrum p√• 1 salen + 43 kvm tagterrasse, hvor  i kan nyde solen i fred og ro. I befinder jer p√• K√∏benhavns attraktive havnefront - Sluseholmen. Omr√•det har ideel placering, om du arbejder i eller udenfor byen. 

Lejligheden indeholder: Rummelig entr√© med trappe til 1 salen, 3 gode v√¶relser samt badev√¶relse med brus og vaskefaciliteter. 1 salen byder g√¶stetoilet, kontor afdeling samt p√• et  stort k√∏kken-alrum ifm. med stuen, Her er en ekstra loftsh√∏jde (ca. 5 m) og vinduer fra gulv til loft, der giver et fantastisk lysindfald samt en god udsigt over kanalerne og havneindl√∏bet.
P-plads med mulighed for Clever ellader i k√¶lderen samt b√•dplads kan tillejes.
Tilleje i 3-4 √•r

Her er kort afstand til motorvej & lufthavn, f√• minutter til S-tog og indre City er blot et lille kvarter v√¶k. Omr√•det er kendetegnet ved de mange kanaler, slusen og havnel√∏bet der sammen med de mange sm√• b√•dklubber samt havnebadet giver en sk√∏n maritim stemning. INFO : I 2024 kommet den nye metro M4, som k√∏rer direkte til Orientkat i Nordhavn (CIS), hvor det n√¶rmeste stop er blot 5 min. p√• g√•ben fra lejligheden, som g√∏r det endnu lettere at komme ind til centrum.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

description:
üî∂ 3 v√¶relser - 95 m¬≤ - Br√∏nsh√∏j üî∂ Hyggelig stor lejlighed med tre v√¶relser, k√∏kken, badev√¶relse, br√¶ndeovn og egen have.

P√• den anden side er der to fine sovev√¶relser samt flot toilet med brusekabine og h√•ndvask.

Til sidst tilh√∏rer en virkelig flot have lejligheden, hvor man kan nyde det gode vejr og kreative aktiviteter som havepasning. Der er ogs√• et stort opbevaringsrum. 

Aconto bel√∏b d√¶kker over vand. Elforbrug afregnes s√¶rkilt. Der kr√¶ves 3 m√•neds depositum og 3 m√•neds forudbetalt husleje.

The apartment has a unique location, 200 meters from Husum Station, and also walking distance to two of the best parks in Copenhagen area, Utterslev Mose and Kagsmose.

In the area you can find several restaurants and caf√©s. The center of the city is 23 minutes away by S-train, which runs every 10 minutes during weekdays.

The apartment is 95 sqm. and ideally distributed. It has its own entrance, where you will find the laundry room, exclusive to the apartment. Up the stairs, one arrives at fully equiped kitchen.
Next to it, there is a spacious living room with a fireplace, and a large covered balcony with sliding doors that illuminate the entire room.
On the other side there is a roomy bathroom, with vanity and shower. Finally, there are two spacious carpeted bedrooms overlooking the side and front yards.
Outside in the garden, one can enjoy the outdoors and practice some gardening. There is also a generous storage room.

title: Et sted at bo. Et sted at leve. Et sted at blive.
description:
Lygtehusene ligger d√©r, hvor N√∏rrebro og Nordvest m√∏des ‚Äì i et omr√•de i hastig udvikling og med en puls, man kan m√¶rke. Her bor du f√• minutters gang fra b√•de S-tog, metro og busser, og p√• cykel n√•r du resten af byen p√• ingen tid.

Lygtehusene er et moderne Multi-Age boligkvarter midt p√• N√∏rrebro ‚Äì et sted, hvor livet kan folde sig ud i alle dets faser. Her m√∏des unge, b√∏rnefamilier og seniorer i et mangfoldigt miks af boligtyper og f√¶llesskaber, der underst√∏tter b√•de hverdag og livsdr√∏mme.

title: Penthouse med alt hvad hjertet beg√¶rer
description:
Penthouse med den smukkeste udsigt og en ro der er fantastisk ‚Äì selvom du bor midt i K√∏benhavn. Denne sk√∏nne 7 v√¶r. lejlighed ligger i det centrale K√∏benhavn. Ord kan ikke beskrive denne lejlighed ‚Äì det skal simpelthen opleves. Vigtigt, at bem√¶rke, at i lejligheden medf√∏lger flotte gardiner og der er mulighed ligeledes at leje en parkeringsplads i k√¶lderen.

Der er 2 eksklusive penthouses med en sk√∏n stor 180 graders tagterrasse til hver. Prisen er p√• kr. 57.000 + vand, varme og k√∏l.

Lejligheden ligger i Postbyens markante silhuet med sine fire runde t√•rne er allerede blevet et nyt vartegn for den centrale del af K√∏benhavn. I to af t√•rnene indrettes der 160 moderne lejeboliger.

I Postbyen bor du i et helt nyt levende bykvarter med hoteller, butikker, restauranter, caf√©er, og meget mere. Dit nye hjem ligger omgivet af smuk arkitektur, og nedenfor din hovedd√∏r ligger byparken, der gr√∏nt og frodigt snor sig gennem Postbyen. Fri for biler og med plads til mennesker.

title: Unique furnished apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is available from July 14 for a one-year lease, with possibility of extension.

We are looking for a single person or a couple. It is not suitable for families or sharing, and pets are not allowed.

This three-room corner apartment is located in a rare building in old town Copenhagen with a spectacular view of the historical Nikolaj Church. The apartment has the full corner of the building and is situated on the 3rd floor allowing plenty of light from six windows facing the street and two windows facing the rooftops and Parliament building. The fully equipped kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated. The large and bright living room features an old fireplace, inbuilt shelves, a desk, a solid oak wood table with space for six people, a two-seater sofa, and chairs from &tradition. All furniture and lighting are high-quality contemporary design. The kitchen is equipped with a Dishwasher, oven, washing machine, microwave oven, and the apartment has a lot of inbuilt storage space. The bedroom has a tall double bed and a closet fitting-room style. The middle room is an 18th-century service hall remade as a guest room with a daybed. 

We are a Swedish/Danish couple renting out the Apartment on a long term basis because we are living in New York. You can visit the apartment by contacting us here.

------------

This apartment is a fantastic match for many wishes!

2 bedrooms, living room and kitchen-dining room.

- Couples with children have direct access from the living room to a wide terrace and enclosed courtyard, where the children can play with the other children while the parents themselves enjoy the sun.
- Singles get a spacious apartment with a separate study room and access to a shared huge rooftop terrace.
- Seniors get a bright and friendly apartment with its own terrace, no door steps, a lift to the parking garage and street level and to the rooftop terrace.
- Expats get a modern home with easy access to transport to the airport, workplaces and embassies.

Very well laid out apartment in very good condition.
- 2 bedrooms with good furnishing options and good light from large windows.

- Parking possible in the basement (Jeudan). Electric chargers are set up at all places. Also access for guests.

title: Spacious, sunlit, fully furnished apartment in the heart of N√∏rrebro
description:
We are renting out our newly modernized, fully furnished apartment for 4 months, starting from 1st of November 2025 and ending 28th of February 2026. 
The apartment has a combined living-room/kitchen with large windows with lots of natural light and sky view, including a small balcony. In the afternoon you have beautiful sunsets and natural light.
The kitchen is equipped with all the utensils you need for cooking at home, including a dishwasher.
Wi-Fi is included and available for everyone living in the building block.
Together with our friendly neighbors we share two roof-top terraces (one on each building) that are accessible all year round. There are also laundromats in the basement which can be used for a small fee.
The apartment is located in close proximity to 4 supermarkets, well-kept green areas and various restaurant and caf√© areas in the neighborhood. It‚Äôs also well-located to reach Frederiksberg, Assistens Kirkeg√•rd, the lakes (Peblinge S√∏) and the center of Copenhagen, and has very easy access to public transport (bus and metro).
Electricity, gas and heating is included in the price. However, to avoid excessive use there will be an upper limit based on our own expenses, but somewhat above this limit.
We are looking for responsible people to take care of our apartment while we are away.

title: Renovatated furnised apartment in Gentofte/Vangede for 1-3 month with possibility for extension
description:
Dear Renter

I have my 59 m2 apartment in Vangede/Gentofte, furnished as you see in picture. Right now it is furnished for 2 persons with a sleeping- and and living room, nice kitchen and bathroom. It will ready and furnished from 01.07.2025 as current renter wants to go back to their country after trying living in DK and job situation was not good. It is not for family with kids, better for single or couples.

The apartment will be rented out 1 month at a time with the possibility of extension. The apartment is undersold and you must be open to working with the real estate agent and keeping it neat for viewing.

Rent is 13.000 dkr. plus heat/water every month (Electricity, you will be connect yourself so it will be direct). Deposit is 13.000 dkr. and if you of course treat the apartment nice you will get all money back (I have references here from earlier renters). Price is including Internet and please note there is no TV, but you are welcome bring one.

Hope you like the design of funishing and check out the area. There are busses close and 25 minutes to center of Cph.

*washing machine and drying tumbler in basement.

Kristian K.

description:

English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager F√¶lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager F√¶lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

title: Inner Copenhagen Apartment - availability asap
description:
MOVE IN DATE, ASAP IN JUNE 2025.

Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, Str√∏get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 14,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

The master bedroom has direct access to a large bathroom with a shower.

All in all, a lovely apartment with Amager Strandpark just across the street, and less than 500 meters to √òresund Metro Station, where the journey to the airport takes 6 minutes and to Kgs. Nytorv takes 7 minutes.

title: HELT ny 2-v√¶relses med k√¶mpe tagterrasse
description:
OBS - Billederne er fra en pr√∏vebolig, men VIDEOEN er fra denne bolig. 

Project Radio ligger p√• Gyngemose Parkvej i S√∏borg, som husede DR fra 1963 til 2007. Over de seneste √•r er den tidligere TV-Byen blevet omdannet til et attraktivt og livligt boligomr√•de.
Mere end 1.000 nye moderne boliger, erhverv, butikker, privathospital og store, gr√∏nne arealer pryder omr√•det. 

I de nye suver√¶ne lejeboliger i 1 eller 2 plan er der plads til mindre og st√∏rre b√∏rnefamilier. Boligerne varierer mellem 2-5 v√¶relser og 49-112 m2, s√• du kan finde en lejlighed, der passer til dig og din families behov.

Tr√¶d ind og f√∏l dig hjemme p√• de mat lakerede tr√¶gulve, der st√•r i kontrast til det r√• betonloft med et sandbl√¶st udtryk og de hvide v√¶gge, der s√¶tter stilen i din nye bolig. Kontrasten mellem det lyse og lette gulv og det r√•, h√•rde betonloft bringer en dynamisk indretning til live, s√• boligen emmer af moderne nordisk design.

Dine nye over- og underskabe fra HTH har en slidst√¶rk, lysegr√• lakering, der ligesom dit badev√¶relse bliver let at holde rent. I overskabene er der installeret LED-spots, der oplyser den flotte bordplade af massiv eg.
De rene linjer spiller nydeligt sammen med indbygningsskabe til k√∏le-/ fryseskab, ovn, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine. Armaturet er fra Oras Saga, der er et brugervenligt, robust og alsidigt armatur i moderne, nordisk design.
Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

Badev√¶relset er i tr√•d med den h√∏je kvalitet, som kendetegner boligen. P√• gulv og i bruseniche er der matte, m√∏rkegr√• klinker, der elegant spiller sammen med de tilsvarende fliser p√• v√¶ggene. Det v√¶gh√¶ngte og vandsparende toilet med soft luk fra Villeroy & Boch har indbygningscisterne.
Den flotte keramiske h√•ndvask er placeret over stilrene Dansani-skabe med glatte, hvide overflader, der er lette for dig at vedligeholde. Der medf√∏lger ogs√• en vaskes√∏jle med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler fra Vestfrost. Armaturer i h√•ndvask og bruseniche er fra Grohe.

Project Radio byder p√• mange sk√∏nne f√¶llesfaciliteter, som hele familien kan benytte sig af. Her kan b√∏rnene hygge sig, ligesom du kan invitere til b√∏rnef√∏dselsdage med aktiviteter og spil.

Tingbjerget er opf√∏rt med de karakteristiske gule teglsten og er designet med stor respekt for den oprindelige arkitektur, som Steen Ejlers Rasmussen skabte i 1940‚Äôerne. Samtidig gennemg√•r Tingbjerg en sp√¶ndende udvikling, hvor moderne arkitektur og historisk charme smelter sammen. Beliggenheden er ideel for dem, der √∏nsker at kombinere byens puls med naturens ro.

title: Super nice 2-room apartment in Frederiksberg C -Expats only
description:
The apartment is located at a highly sought after address in Frederiksberg. The apartment can be rented for 1-2 years. No Pets!
The apartment is on the 4th floor. There is access to the apartment via a closed gate and the beautiful courtyard environment. There is an elevator!
The apartment is a large 2 bedroom apartment of 86 m2 and offers a distribution entrance with built-in closets and space for outerwear. From the hallway there is a newer, nice bathroom. The bathroom is in a good size with underfloor heating, shower, built-in IF√ñ hanging toilet and with washer and dryer.
The apartment has a state-of-the-art kitchen living room with the most delicious appliances as well as Quooker Fusion and wine refrigerator.
The apartment has a nice large living room, where there is plenty of space for both dining area and sofa area. From the living room there is access to the balcony with plenty of space to sit and enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.
Furthermore, there is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes.
There are two balconies ‚Äì one to the northeast at the entrance to the apartment and one to the southwest.
Aconto consumption:
Heating: 560 DKK pr. month
Water: 260 DKK per. month
Internet: 250 DKK pr. month
Broadband is installed via wireless modem from Yousee. The subscription can be taken over.
The apartment is NOT for sharing!! When contacting, please note your phone number !!

The area: Holger Danskes Vej is located centrally in Frederiksberg, close to all the good shopping opportunities, the atmospheric cafe life and the many coffee bars on Falkoner Alle and Godth√•bsvej as well as walking distance to means of transport such as bus and Aksel M√∏llers Have Metro. In addition, close distance to Frederiksberg Center and the cozy Agricultural University Garden ‚Äì a small oasis in the busy city life. Here you will live in a quiet, green and at the same time central area with a short walking distance to virtually all daily necessities. Holger Danske‚Äôs road itself is a quiet road, planted with trees and good parking opportunities. The road is quietly located with one-way traffic.
You can cycle to the metro in five minutes and to the center of Copenhagen in ten minutes. BUS 2A runs towards R√•dhuspladsen, and there is a five-minute walk to the bus stop.

title: Helt nyopf√∏rt
description:
I helt nykonverteret ejendom udbydes nu l√¶kker 3 v√¶relses lejlighed p√• 93 kvm i topkvalitet og et moderne og r√•t New Yorker look. Lejligeden har en lofth√∏jde p√• ca 3 meter, og i nogen af rummene er der NewYorker glasv√¶gge, hvilket giver et helt unikt lysindfald, og f√•r lejligheden til at fremst√• endnu mere rummelig.

title: 5 mins walk from the Little Mermaid
description:
This apartment is only rented out from 1-3 month at a time. 
A bright spacious (211 m2 - 2271 sq. ft.) apartment with nice views and 5 minutes walk from the Little Mermaid. title: Central modern apartment with own rooftop terrace
description:
Available from June 1, 2025. 

A modern, stylish apartment located at the Harbour side, in central Copenhagen.

Perfect for the small family relocating or expats moving to Copenhagen for a limited time. There is a possibility for extension. 

/The apartment 
It is a two-bedroom apartment with three terraces, including a private rooftop terrace (approx. 60 m2) and the possibility to access two shared rooftop terraces. 

The apartment comes fully furnished with all needed kitchen wear and appliances, and further incl. dishwasher, washing machine, dryer etc. 

The building has elevator included, and it is possible to rent parking in the connected parking garage. 

/The neighbourhood
It is in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to "The Little Mermaid", Kastellet, and Kongens Nytorv. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãThere is a opportunity for grocery shopping within 20 meters. 
‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
Furthermore, the area has several great restaurants, varying from Michelin restaurants to a local cosy pizzeria.

title: New Studio Apartment with terrace - Fully furnished
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this modern, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent.

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance.

The studio is equipped with:
‚Ä¢	Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm)
‚Ä¢	Desk
‚Ä¢	Storage cabinet
‚Ä¢	Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood)
‚Ä¢	Private bathroom with shower

Community Amenities:
‚Ä¢	Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms
‚Ä¢	Roof terrace and courtyard garden
‚Ä¢	Atrium with cozy community atmosphere
‚Ä¢	Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)

About the building complex:
‚Ä¢	Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area
‚Ä¢	Proximity to K√∏benhavn Syd Metro (less than 300 meters away) - 15 min to Copenhagen Central Station by metro
‚Ä¢	F√∏tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep
‚Ä¢	Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas
‚Ä¢	Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg
‚Ä¢	Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning

Free access to community amenities:
‚Ä¢	Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships
‚Ä¢	Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment. 
The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.  

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

description:

Boligerne er lyse og velindrettede med et mindre k√∏kken og opholdsrum i √©t, samt et kvadratisk badev√¶relse. Materialerne p√• gulvene er en varm gr√• linoleum, og v√¶ggene er hvide. Der er enkelte handicapvenlige ¬≠lejligheder fordelt p√• etagerne. De √∏verste boliger i tagetagen har en ekstra charme med en delvist skr√• yderv√¶g.
Ejendommen:

F√¶lles:
Alle boliger har adgang til f√¶lleslokale mod gaden og stort lyst vaskeri mod haven - begge i stueetagen. Alle boliger har eget depot i k√¶lderen. Cykelparkering er placeret i afl√•st k√¶lder samt p√• terr√¶n.
Omr√•det:
En unik og sp√¶ndende ny bydel med et stort potentiale. Projektet er en omdannelse og revitalisering af et gammelt industrikvarter til et levende og mangfoldigt beboelses- og erhvervsomr√•de. Boligerne er centralt placeret i bydelen ved Husum Torv med ¬≠mangfoldige indk√∏bsmuligheder og t√¶t p√• offentlig transport og skole. T√¶t p√• ligger Utterslev Mose, et fantastisk rekreativt omr√•de med s√∏ og natur, samt Vestvolden, som er en 17 km lang rekreativ cykel- og g√•rute fra ¬≠Utterslev Mose til Br√∏ndby Havn.

title: Furnished Studio - Ideal for young professionals -  300m from Metro
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. 

This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
‚Ä£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Desk 
‚Ä£ Storage cabinet 
‚Ä£ Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood) 
‚Ä£ Private bathroom with shower 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Atrium with cozy community atmosphere 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area 
‚Ä£ Proximity to K√∏benhavn Syd Metro (less than 300 meters away) - 15 min to Copenhagen Central Station by metro 
‚Ä£ F√∏tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas 
‚Ä£ Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg 
‚Ä£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

title: 2-v√¶relses lejebolig i Herlev
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:
Find din nye lejebolig blandt de 445 lejeboliger. Her er et husrum til dig, der har brug for at b√∏rnene f√•r eget v√¶relse. Til parret, der vil have ekstra god plads. Til jer, der vil downsize. Til dem der vil bo alene. Til dem der vil bo sammen.
Frem for alt er der plads til alle livsfaser og dr√∏mme i Bakkek√¶rets f√¶llesskab mellem dig, naboer og naturen.
Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens femte etape med indflytning 1. juni 2025.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.
Med tre orangerier, tagterrasser og et f√¶lleshus p√• 400 m2, er der skabt rum til b√•de alenetid, familietid og hyggetid.
Herlev:
Lige rundt om hj√∏rnet fra Bakkek√¶ret finder du Herlev Bymidte og Herlev Bygade. Her kan du klare hverdagens indk√∏b, men kan ogs√• finde restauranter, t√∏jbutikker, fris√∏r og meget mere. Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI
- K√¶ledyr skal godkendes af udlejer
- Bem√¶rk, at billedmaterialet ikke n√∏dvendigvis stammer fra den p√•g√¶ldende bolig

title: 3-V√ÜRELSES I BALLERUP
description:
Lejlighederne kommer med forskellige planl√∏sninger. Nogle lejligheder har en lille entr√©, og i andre lejligheder tr√¶der man direkte ind i k√∏kken-alrummet. Du f√•r et godt og funktionelt indrettet badev√¶relse med separat bruseniche og vaskes√∏jle med kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Alt afh√¶ngig af lejlighedens st√∏rrelse er der 1 til 3 separate v√¶relser udover k√∏kken-alrummet. Der er depotrum tilg√¶ngeligt i n√¶sten alle lejem√•l bortset fra otte boliger, hvor depotrummet er udenfor lejem√•let.

Alle lejlighederne i stueetagen har egen terrasse  omkranset af  lille h√¶k. Ligeledes har alle lejligheder fra 1. sal og op en altan.

H√•rde hvidevarer
Der er alt i h√•rde hvidevarer samt en kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

Husdyr
Lejere kan ans√∏ge om tilladelse til at holde indekat og hund p√• adressen. Udekatte er ikke tilladt. Kontakt os for mere information.

Parkering
Der er i alt 129 p-pladser, hvoraf 41 er i parkeringsk√¶lder mens de resterende 88 ligger i terr√¶n. Af de 129 p-pladser er flere handicappladser og pladser forbeholdt el- og hybridbiler.

Elevator
Der er elevator i alle bygninger, som er h√∏jere end 2 etager. . Det vil sige, at nummer 6, 8 og 11 ikke har en elevator, hvorimod resten har.

F√¶lles arealer
Bygningerne danner til sammen rammen om et sk√∏nt omr√•de med gode hyggekroge, plads til at boltre sig samt mulighed for flere aktiviteter og boldspil. Imellem boligerne er der fine stier og opholdsrum med tr√¶er, h√∏je gr√¶sser samt andet vild og blomsterfuld beplantning for at fremme biodiversiteten. Der er ligeledes et b√•nd af marksten langs den prim√¶re sti igennem projektets omr√•de, som skaber en √¶stetisk flot LAR-l√∏sning til opsamling af regnvand. En fin legeplads bliver samlingspunktet for omr√•dets b√∏rn, hvor de kan lege og hygge sig sammen. Der er cykelparkering i alle de tre g√•rdmilj√∏er.

De viste billeder kan v√¶re fra et andet men tilsvarende lejem√•l i samme ejendom. Mindre afvigelser kan derfor forekomme.
address: 23. marts, Postgrunden, 2750 K√∏benhavn, Ballerup  - 1. sal

title: Short term: Charmerende lejlighed i hjertet af K√∏benhavn ved S√∏erne
description:
English version:
____________________________________________________________________________________
Charming apartment in the heart of Copenhagen ‚Äì Classic elegance meets modern comfort (Period: 15. Aug - 15. Dec 2025)

We‚Äôre delighted to present this inviting apartment located in the very center of Copenhagen ‚Äì the ideal home for expats looking to experience the city up close during the beautiful autumn season. Set in a classic building full of character, this apartment seamlessly blends historical charm with modern conveniences.

Well-designed and fully equipped
The apartment offers 78 sqm of bright, well-organized space with an open-plan kitchen and living area that creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere. description:

.

Omr√•det:

Centrum for Frederiksstaden er Amalienborg, og Amaliegade str√¶kker sig mod nord som fornem l√¶ngdeakse. Der var strenge krav til bygningernes arkitektoniske korrespondens, og kongens hofarkitekter Lauritz de Thurah og Nicolai Eigtved stod for planl√¶gning og udf√∏relse af den nye bydel. Dejlig central beliggenhed - t√¶t p√• Kastellet, Amalienborg, St. Kongensgades mange indk√∏bsmuligheder og meget mere.

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

‚Ä£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
‚Ä£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
‚Ä£ Loft with bed 
‚Ä£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
‚Ä£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
‚Ä£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
‚Ä£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on B√ºlowsvej 
‚Ä£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚Ä£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Restaurants, parks, caf√©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: Studio for 1 person - Modern Housing in Copenhagen Nordhavn
description:
This spacious modern studio for 1 person, is located right by the water in Nordhavn. When staying at us, you will get access to all the facilities that you will need. 

What‚Äôs inside? 

Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  

Kitchenette; Cabinets with a sink, extractor hood, oven, stove and refrigerator. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  

Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 

3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 

Bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 

The studio further comes with wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, a hook for a ceiling lamp of your own, roller blinds and hooks for outerwear. 

On top of that, you will get access to:‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Fitness: fully equipped gym included in the rent 
- Rooftop terrace‚ÄØ 
- Laundry room‚ÄØ(paid over rent)‚ÄØ 
- Group rooms you can book‚ÄØthrough our app 
- Study hall‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Nordhavn Metro is close by  
- Community Manager on site to help with all questions 
- Events ‚Äì you can take part in our social events and the running club and creative club.

About: 

The dorm offers co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active life.
Just around the corner you will find caf√©s, restaurants and supermarkets. Or go and visit the cinema or the rooftop gym across the street. 

The heart of the dorm is the community: the majority of the residents live across 14 communal kitchens. The communal kitchens are designed to create the best framework for communities. Whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

title: 2 v√¶r. lejlighjed p√• 98 kvm.
description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent unfurnished. The lease period is for 12-24 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. The renovation process adhered to strict architectural standards, leading to the selection of Dorte Mandrup Architects to design the 20 new apartments.

At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the building‚Äôs shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere ‚Äî ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

description:
Smuk lejlighed p√• N√∏rrebro udlejes til enkeltperson eller par

Jeg udlejer min lille oase i den bedste del af N√∏rrebro fra dags dato (8. marts) og indtil slut Maj/Start Juni, afh√¶ngigt af aftale. Lejligheden er 65 Kvm og best√•r af 2 v√¶relser, 2 altaner, et rummeligt k√∏kken-alrum, et stort bad og er fuldt m√∏bleret. 5 minutters g√• gang fra metrostation Skjolds Plads og 2 minutter fra Bus 6A og 8A. 10 minutter fra Den R√∏de + Sorte Plads, Assistentens Kirkeg√•rd, Stefansgadekvarteret og F√¶lledparken. Beliggenhed p√• 4 sal g√∏r, at vintersolen skinner ind i begge v√¶relser p√• klare dage.

K√∏kkenet har spiseplads til 5, en stor egetr√¶s b√¶nk og er ellers n√¶sten over-ekviperet med espressomaskine, kvalitets ovn, gasblus, emh√¶tte, opvaskemaskine og vaske/t√∏rremaskine. Der er altan tilknyttet, der vender ned mod g√•rdene og har udsigt over Bananna Park og krydderurter ad libitum.

Sovev√¶relset best√•r af en 1,5-mands seng, k√¶mpe skrivebord til arbejdet, skab og endnu en lille arbejdsplads. Der er endnu en altan fra sovev√¶relset ud til vejen.

Stor, rummelig stue med 3-personers sofa, l√¶nestol, 42" fladsk√¶rm med Chromecast og masser af smukke planter.

Badet best√•r af et indbygget toilet, en seperat bruseniche med vandfaldsbruser og med 2 store staldvinduer for at bringe lys ind i rummet. 

Jeg har brugt mange √•r p√• at g√∏re lejligheden til et helt s√¶rligt sted og indrettet p√• min egen m√•de - jeg  foretr√¶kker dermed lejere, der passer p√• stedet, som jeg selv g√∏r! Du m√• ogs√• gerne have lidt gr√∏nne fingre, s√• mine planter kan f√• k√¶rlighed, mens du bor i lejligheden. 



ENGLISH BELOW

Beautiful apartment in N√∏rrebro for rent to a single person or couple

I am renting out my little oasis in the best part of N√∏rrebro from right away (March 8th) and until End May/Start June, depending on the agreement made. The apartment is 65 sq m and consists of 2 rooms, 2 balconies, a spacious kitchen/dining room, a large bathroom and is fully furnished. 5 minutes walk from metro station Skjolds Plads and 2 minutes from Bus 6A and Bus Nr. 18. 10 minutes from The Red & Black Square, "Assistentens Kirkeg√•rd", The Stefansgade Area and "F√¶lledparken". Location on the 4th floor means that the winter sun shines into both rooms on clear days and the apartment is lit up nonstop during summer months. 

The kitchen has a dining area for 5, a large oak bench and is otherwise fully equipped with an espresso machine, quality oven, gas hob, extractor hood, dishwasher and combination washer/dryer. There is an attached balcony that faces the courtyards and has a view of Bananna Park. 

The bedroom consists of a 1.5-person bed, big closet with interior lighting and a huge mirror. There is another balcony from the bedroom with view to the street

Large, spacious living room with 3-person sofa, armchair, 42" flat screen with Chromecast and lots of beautiful plants.

The bathroom consists of a built-in toilet, a separate shower with waterfall shower, heated floors and with 2 large barn windows to bring light into the room.

I have spent many years making the apartment a very special place and decorated in my own way - I therefore prefer tenants who take care of the place, as I do myself! Another plus if you have a love for greenery, so my plants can get some love while you live in the apartment.

title: L√¶kker lys villalejlighed udlejes.
description:
P√• hj√∏rnet af Hvidovrevej og Cath. Booths Vej i Hvidovre, ligger denne flotte, lyse og fuldst√¶ndig nyistandsatte villalejlighed. Lejligheden er f√∏rstesalen i en velholdt ejendom fra 1924. Der er absolut ingen trafikst√∏j, p√• trods af placeringen p√• Hvidovrevej.
Der er 74 flotte kvadratmeter, med stort spritnyt badev√¶relse, nyt Invita k√∏kken, super hyggelig stue og to gode sovev√¶relser. Lejligheden er netop sat i stand med nyt k√∏kken og badev√¶relse, nye stikkontakter, nyt gulv, maling af alle d√∏re og vinduer, slebet og lakeret trappe osv. 

Der er desuden en lille g√•rdhave, hvor man passende kan s√¶tte et lille bord og nogle havestole...

Der er egen parkering, bussen k√∏rer lige uden for d√∏ren og Friheden Station er kun 500 meter nede ad vejen. Det tager 10 minutter at k√∏re til Valby, og 20 minutter at k√∏re ind til centrum. Tilk√∏rslerne til Amagermotorvejen og Holb√¶kmotorvejen er kun 3 minutter v√¶k.

Lejligheden koster 13.500,- pr. m√•ned + 1.200,- aconto og er ledig fra 01.04.2023. 

Da vi bor i udlandet, vil der v√¶re 3 √•rs uopsigelighed fra vores side, og l√∏bende m√•ned + 3 m√•neder fra din/jeres side. 
Der skal kunne betales 3 m√•neders depositum, 3 m√•neders forudbetalt husleje og 1. m√•neds husleje, i alt kr. 95.700,- ved indflytning.
Husdyr er ikke tilladt, dog kan et lille husdyr op til max. 4 kg. som udgangspunkt accepteres ligesom indend√∏rs rygning ikke er det. Vi s√∏ger nogle lejere som vil behandle stedet som deres eget. 

Der vil v√¶re indflyttersyn, og lejligheden skal ved fraflytning bringes til samme stand som ved indflytning.

title: 3 v√¶relses lejlighed p√• Niels Steensens Vej  i Gentofte udlejes
description:
48 nye lejeboliger i natursk√∏nne Gentofte.

Lejeboligerne er opf√∏rt i eksklusivt design, hvor alle detaljer er gennemt√¶nkte. Lejeboligerne har et lavt energiniveau og forsynes med fjernvarme fra Gentofte kommune.

Alle rum i boligerne har gulvvarme under de utrolig flotte plankegulve i eg. Endvidere er der installeret energivenlige elementer, s√•som et grebsfrit k√∏kken fra HTH samt induktionskogeplader og pyrolyseovn. Dertil k√∏le-/fryseskab fra Siemens, ogs√• med et lavt energiniveau.

Badev√¶relset byder p√• luksus sanitet og er l√¶kkert at opholde sig i, med fliser p√• b√•de gulv og i bruseniche.

title: Apartment in central and hip N√∏rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant N√∏rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. You‚Äôll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of N√∏rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: K√∏lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.

title: Unik 4-v√¶relses lejlighed i Charlottenlund
description:
Beliggende i det fredelige og hyggelige villakvarter i Ordrup, nord for K√∏benhavn, finder du denne smukke og gennemgribende renoverede lejlighed p√• 130 m2 med sildebensparket, privat g√•rdhave, stor stue med udsigt til den middelhavsagtige have bag den katolske kirke, 3 gode sovev√¶relser, eksklusivt badev√¶relserne med √∏landsfliser, flot Poggenpohl-k√∏kken med Quooker og eksklusive h√•rdehvidevarer.

Dette lejem√•l er et sj√¶ldent fund, hvor du har muligheden for at leje noget helt unikt og i en smuk historisk bygning, der tidligere har tilh√∏rt den katolske kirke. I 1800-tallet var Polly Berling, tidligere ejer af Berlingske Tidende, en markant skikkelse. I 1869 konverterede hun til den katolske tro, og efter sin mands d√∏d to √•r senere √∏nskede hun at √¶re sin nye tro ved at skabe noget meningsfuldt. Hendes vision var klar: en katolsk skole og kirke for drenge. Med k√∏bet af landstedet Ordrupsh√∏j i 1863 l√• grundstenene til hendes dr√∏m allerede klar. I 1873 stod den smukke arkitekttegnede skole og kirke endelig f√¶rdig p√• Ordrupsh√∏j. Nu, n√¶sten 150 √•r senere, st√•r dette historiske monument som et tidl√∏st symbol p√• Polly Berlings engagement og vision. En del af dette historiske kompleks er nu blevet omformet til fem eksklusive lejeboliger af enest√•ende karakter.

Skriv eller ring for en fremvisning. Vi gl√¶der os til at vise dig denne smukke bolig.

description:

Det andet b√∏rnev√¶relse, samt det store badev√¶relse med bord af granit tilg√•s fra entreen. 

Alle h√•rde hvidevarer medf√∏lger (komfur, ovn, k√∏l, frys, opvask, vask og t√∏rretumbler).
Til lejligheden h√∏rer egen parkeringsplads og eget k√¶lderrum, foruden del i f√¶lles
k√¶lderrum. Ejendommen er omkranset af b√∏geh√¶k og lindetr√¶er.

Som udlejere har vi haft flere lejere gennem √•rene, altid med gensidig respekt, og alle har forladt huset tilfredse. Her er, hvad en tidligere lejer skrev:

"Endnu en gang vil jeg gerne udtrykke min dybf√∏lte taknemmelighed for jeres vedvarende st√∏tte gennem √•rene og for at v√¶re s√• venlige og im√∏dekommende udlejere. "
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In continuation of Gentoftegade, Kongelysvej, a small blind road, is well protected from Lyngbyvejens traffic and noise, but at the same time close to everything, including buses, trains, shopping and post office. The property is from 1937 and it was refurbished from basement to roof in 2003/4 with new features of condominiums. New Paint from 2025.  

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. The another children\'s room, as well as the large bathroom with granite table accessed from the entrance hall. 

All White goods included (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, all in one washing machine and tumble dryer). The apartment has its own car park and own cellar, in addition to shared facilities basement. The property is surrounded by beech hedges and linden trees.

As landlord, I have hosted several tenants over the years, always with mutual respect, and all have left the house satisfied. Here‚Äôs what one of my former tenants had to say:

"Once again, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support over the years and for being such a kind and friendly landlord. "
